alert.note: Alert for East Polk (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 09 at 12:10PM CST until November 11 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM THURSDAY TO 10 AM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...East Polk County. * WHEN...From 4 AM Thursday to 10 AM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are possible due to the ice. Travel will be nearly impossible. Widespread blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates of over an inch an hour are possible.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
